attributes.action: Lower gas prices so family’s that are not as fortunate can have warm houses.
attributes.additional_details: The reason why I want the government to lower the gas prices is because some family’s were already struggling with money but now they have to worry about heating up their homes witch is ridiculous, I think that if things keep going on like this thousands of people are going to become homeless and that’s not what anybody wants so please sign this petition.
attributes.background: The thing I want the government to do is I want them to lower the gas prices as they’ve gone up exponentially because some family’s already have to worry about having food for they kids but now the gas prices have gone up they have more to worry about (including going homeless).

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The energy cap is set by Ofgem, which is operationally independent of the Government and Parliament. You can find out more about how the energy price cap is set here: https://www.ofgem.gov.uk/publications/price-cap-increase-ps693-april

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Subsidise energy prices to offset any increase in the energy price cap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586
